title: House Of Cards (2013) Season 2 - COMPLETE w Eng Soft Subs 720p W
description:
image


Created by Beau Willimon, Ã¢â‚¬Å“House of Cards,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ takes a look into the sneaky politics and the underhand of U.S. electoral politics. The one-hour drama follows Frank Underwood (Kevin Spacey, an ambitious politician with his eye on the top job. With the Secretary of State promotion he was hoping for out of reach, Frank seeks to right the wrong that has been done to him.

In a modern day Washington D.C., the series managed to impress the audiences and gathered quite a following. The series was previously a BBC miniseries and based on a book by Michael Dobbs. Netflix streamed the series. The USA version of the show also stars: Robin Wright, Kate Mara, and Corey Stoll.

Set in current day Washington DC, Season 2 deals with topics such as entitlements, Chinese cyberespionage, anthrax scares, parliamentary procedure, and government shutdowns. It begins at the exact time that season 1 ended with the Underwoods jogging in triumph. Upon returning home, Doug Stamper (Michael Kelly) informs them that the Slugline crew is investigating curious links that they have found. Once Frank gets back to his dirty dealing, he begins with attempting to erase all links to season 1's death of Congressman Peter Russo (Corey Stoll). Another early task for newly promoted Underwood is finding his own replacement as House Majority Whip. He supports Jacqueline Sharp (Molly Parker), a military vet and third-term Representative from California, although he refrains from offering public backing. During Sharp's pursuit of the position, she earn's Frank's approval. Zoe Barnes (Kate Mara) abandons her season 1 sexual and political partnership with Frank to pursue leads about the real story behind Russo's death while allying with Janine Skorsky (Constance Zimmer) and her boyfriend Lucas Goodwin (Sebastian Arcelus). Among the leads is Russo's prostitute (Rachel Brosnahan) who was an accomplice to the murder. Claire continues her battles with Gillian Cole (Sandrine Holt), the pregnant former employee who is her non-profit's counterparty. Frank also spends time undermining the presidentÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s advisor, Raymond Tusk (Gerald McRaney) and doing his best denigrating tea party loyalists. Underwood does manage to negotiate the federal budget plan.

Among the new cast members in season 2 are Molly Parker and Sam Page, while directors include Carl Franklin, Jodie Foster, James Foley and Wright. The season features cameos by several notable journalists, including Ashleigh Banfield, Rachel Maddow, Chris Matthews, Sean Hannity, Morley Safer, and Kelly O'Donnell.

image

Main cast

Kevin Spacey as Francis "Frank" J. Underwood, the Vice President of the United States
Robin Wright as Claire Underwood, the Second Lady of the United States
Kate Mara as Zoe Barnes, an ambitious journalist working for news blog Slugline and former lover of Frank Underwood
Molly Parker as Jacqueline "Jackie" Sharp, a veteran and Underwood's successor as House Majority Whip
Michael Kelly as Douglas "Doug" Stamper, the Chief of Staff to the Vice President of the United States
Sakina Jaffrey as Linda Vasquez, the White House Chief of Staff in the Walker Administration
Kristen Connolly as Christina Gallagher, a headstrong congressional staffer who was involved in a secret relationship with Peter Russo
Sebastian Arcelus as Lucas Goodwin, a senior political editor working at the Washington Herald
Constance Zimmer as Janine Skorsky, a veteran journalist working for news blog Slugline
Mahershala Ali as Remy Danton, a lobbyist with law firm Glendon Hill and former employee of Frank Underwood
Michel Gill as Garrett Walker, the President of the United States

Recurring cast

Reg E. Cathey as Freddy Armstrong, friend of Frank Underwood and the owner of a BBQ restaurant that Frank frequents
Rachel Brosnahan as Rachel Posner, a former prostitute seeking a new life
Gerald McRaney as Raymond Tusk, a multi-billionaire businessman and investor who acts as an advisor and confidante to President Walker
Jayne Atkinson as Catherine Durant, the US Secretary of State in the Walker Administration
Jimmi Simpson as Gavin Orsay
Samuel Page as Connor Ellis
Terry Chen as Xander Feng
Dani Englander as First Lady Patricia Walker
Derek Cecil as Seth Grayson
Ben Daniels as Adam Galloway, a world renowned photographer and former lover of Claire Underwood
Gil Birmingham as Daniel Lanagin
